turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to order a Starbucks beverage, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grande mocha latte with 2% milk no whipped cream The location is going to be at 23 Main Street in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that was a bit fast, sorry. did you say a grande mocha latte with 2 % milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whip cream, yeah? Correct. Sorry about that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you and where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 23 Main Street in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 23rd main st in new york city.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much. Appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
